page.title: 15FARMING NEAR INVERURIE
page.content:
Farms in the area are mainly mixed farms although more farmers are beginning to concentrate on crop growing in place of meat production and dairying. The number of dairy herds has been reduced in the past two years because of E.E.C. regulations to cut down the amount of dairy produce produced.
In this area there are 7 main farms - Upper Kinkell, Leggat, Tweed Dale, Keith Hall Home Farm, Crichie Upper Boat and Ardtannes. The first four are part of the Keith Hall Estate, which is owned by the Earl of Kintore.
Crichie Farm is a dairy farm while Upper Boat is a piggery with 1050 pigs.
